_source.text: 42: Seymour is clearly better than Smith (he is the best, after all), but Smith is a pro-bowl quality player.

text: 42: **Seymour** is clearly **better** **than** **Smith** (he is the best, after all), but **Smith** is a pro-bowl quality player.

_source.text: 2. The USA's top line of Stastny, David Moss (Phoenix Coyotes) and Craig Smith (Nashville Predators) might be playing better than any in the tournament.

text: 2. The USA's top line of Stastny, David Moss (Phoenix Coyotes) and **Craig** **Smith** (Nashville Predators) might be playing **better** **than** any in the tournament.

_source.text: $2.00 Ready Sept. 2nd Frank H. Spearman's Red Hot Western Romance Laramie Holds the Range Laramie is better even than Whisper- ing Smith and Nan of Music Mountain, - the best thing of the kind in years and years.

_source.text: #22 Craig Smith followed with a talk entitled 'Water Wheels' which in essence was a very endearing talk about his dad, a man who apparently "sharpens a drill bit better than any man in Huddersfield".

text: #22 **Craig** **Smith** followed with a talk entitled 'Water Wheels' which in essence was a very endearing
talk about his dad, a man who apparently "sharpens a drill bit **better** **than** any man in Huddersfield".
